question: What payment methods do you accept?
answer: We accept credit/debit cards.. PayPal.. and some local wallets depending on your region.

question: Is cash on delivery available?
answer: Cash on delivery is available for selected locations and order values. You’ll see the option at checkout if it is supported in your area.

question: How can I change my shipping address?
answer: You can change your shipping address from your account before the order is shipped. Once shipped.. the address cannot be modified.

question: How do I contact customer support?
answer: You can contact customer support via email at support@example.com or through the help section in your account.

question: Do I need an account to place an order?
answer: You can place orders as a guest.. but creating an account helps you track orders and manage returns more easily.

question: How can I track my order?
answer: Once your order is shipped.. you’ll receive a tracking link by email and in your account under “My Orders”.

question: What happens if I miss the delivery?
answer: If you miss the delivery.. the courier will usually attempt re-delivery or leave instructions to reschedule. If it returns to us.. we will contact you via email.

question: Can I change or cancel my order after placing it?
answer: You can change or cancel your order before it is processed or shipped. Please contact support as soon as possible.

question: What is your return period?
answer: You can return most items within 30 days of delivery.. as long as they are unused and in original packaging.

question: Are there any non-returnable items?
answer: Yes.. some items like personal care products.. customized items.. and digital goods may be non-returnable. Details are shown on each product page.

question: Do you ship internationally?
answer: Yes.. we ship to many countries worldwide. Shipping availability and cost depend on your location and will be shown at checkout.

question: How long does international shipping take?
answer: International shipping usually takes between 7–21 business days depending on your country and shipping method.

question: Will I have to pay customs or import fees?
answer: Some international orders may be subject to customs or import fees charged by your local authorities. These are not included in our prices.

question: How long does standard shipping take?
answer: Standard shipping typically takes 5–7 business days after dispatch.

question: How do I request a refund?
answer: To request a refund.. go to your order details page.. click “Request Refund”.. and follow the instructions. You can also contact support for help.
